DOC.brief_summary: This 2-part study OTO-104 subject unilateral Meniere 's disease United Kingdom . The first part randomize , placebo-controlled study compare safety profile 2 injection OTO-104 placebo space 3 month apart . The second part open-label extension subject receive additional 2 intratympanic injection OTO-104 space 3 month apart . Each subject participate study total 1 year .
